brave.title: Configure Brave Image Search
brave.description: Enter your Brave Search API credentials.

data_description.searxng_server_url: Protocol, host, and port, e.g.: http://localhost:8080
data_description.searxng_engines: Comma-separated list of image engines, e.g.: bing images,google images. Leave empty to use all enabled engines.

youtube.title: Configure YouTube Video Search
youtube.description: Enter your YouTube Data API v3 key.

data_description.youtube_api_key: Get your API key from the Google Cloud Console with YouTube Data API v3 enabled.

brave_web.title: Configure Brave Web Search
brave_web.description: Enter your Brave Search API credentials.

data_description.searxng_server_url: Protocol, host, and port, e.g.: http://localhost:8080
data_description.searxng_web_engines: Comma-separated list of search engines, e.g.: google,bing,duckduckgo. Leave empty to use all enabled engines.

data_description.wikipedia_detail: Concise returns a short summary. Detailed returns the full introduction section, which uses more LLM tokens.

weather.title: Configure Weather Forecast
weather.description: Select your weather entities. No API key required â€” uses your existing Home Assistant weather integration.

data_description.daily_weather_entity: A weather entity that provides daily forecasts.
data_description.hourly_weather_entity: Optional. Enables hour-by-hour detail when asking about a specific day.
data_description.weather_temperature_sensor: Optional. Includes the current temperature when asking about today's weather.
data_description.weather_humidity_sensor: Optional. Includes the current humidity when asking about today's weather.

finnhub_financial.title: Configure Finnhub Financial Data
finnhub_financial.description: Enter your Finnhub API key. Get a free key at finnhub.io.

data_description.finnhub_api_key: Get your free API key from finnhub.io. Supports stock quotes and currency exchange rates.

abort.image_search_already_configured: Image Search is already configured. Use the existing entry's options to change settings.
abort.video_search_already_configured: Video Search is already configured. Use the existing entry's options to change settings.
abort.web_search_already_configured: Web Search is already configured. Use the existing entry's options to change settings.
abort.wikipedia_already_configured: Wikipedia Search is already configured. Use the existing entry's options to change settings.
abort.weather_already_configured: Weather Forecast is already configured. Use the existing entry's options to change settings.
abort.financial_already_configured: Financial Data is already configured. Use the existing entry's options to change settings.

youtube.description: Update your YouTube video search settings.

brave_web.description: Update your Brave Search API credentials.

data_description.searxng_web_engines: Comma-separated list of search engines, e.g.: google,bing,duckduckgo. Leave empty to use all enabled engines.

data_description.wikipedia_detail: Concise returns a short summary. Detailed returns the full introduction section, which uses more LLM tokens.

weather.title: Weather Forecast Options
weather.description: Update your weather forecast entity settings.

data_description.daily_weather_entity: A weather entity that provides daily forecasts.
data_description.hourly_weather_entity: Optional. Enables hour-by-hour detail when asking about a specific day.
data_description.weather_temperature_sensor: Optional. Includes the current temperature when asking about today's weather.
data_description.weather_humidity_sensor: Optional. Includes the current humidity when asking about today's weather.
